branchCode.label: Preferred CB banking center for loan servicing purposes

termsCondition.condition1: The undersigned hereby represents and warrants that the information herein contained is correct and true and hereby authorizes the bank to conduct any and all creditor job inquiries or investigations, which the bank may in its discretion desert necessary to determine if the undersigned qualifies for the proposed loan pursuant to the application. You may also disclose information about my credit history with the Bank to any credit bureau or so any person with whom I have or purport to have financial Stallings, and may disclose such information to any other person. you believe that you are lawfully required to do so.
termsCondition.condition2: The undersigned further acknowledges that the bank may rescind any preliminary or other approval of this application for any reason whatsoever, without liability or threat of action or suit for so doing.
termsCondition.condition3: I/We also confirm that all credits to the account are and will be beneficially owned by myself.

consents.note: Note: You must be 18 or older to apply

status.label: Application Saved
status.message: You are just a few steps away from completing your application and starting the loan process. If you are unable to complete now, be sure to save your application before you log off.

document-tab.message: Please ensure to upload all documents mentioned below, and click Continue once done.

completion.notification: We'll keep you notified as we need more information.

documents.add-btn-action: Please click on 'ADD' to upload a document which is not there in the list above.
documents.note: The original ID must be presented to finalize the Loan Booking process.

additionalInfo.header: To apply online, we need to confirm just a few things!

requirements.requirement1: You are 18 years old, or older.
requirements.requirement2: You are a resident of Jamaica and legally entitled to be in Jamaica.
requirements.requirement3: You have not declared bankruptcy in the last 7 years (It's okay if you were formally discharged).
requirements.requirement4: If you're applying for a loan, it will only be used by you and, if applicable, your co-applicant.

customerAcceptance.approve.message: Your loan application has been approved. Here is a quick summary for your easy reference:
customerAcceptance.acceptDecline.message: If you accept the terms mentioned above, please click on ACCEPT. If you no longer wish to proceed with your loan application, please click on NOT ACCEPT.
customerAcceptance.accept.message: Thank you for accepting the terms. In order to proceed with your loan closing, we need some additional details:-

monthlyPayment.label: Monthly Payment
monthlyPayment.message: Based on the above, your estimated monthly payment will be:-
monthlyPayment.messageALine: Your monthly payment would be 3% of the outstanding amount or $ 75, whichever is greater.
monthlyPayment.note: ** Note: this is an estimate of your monthly payment. Your actual amount may vary and will be detailed in your loan documents.

customerAcceptance.declined.line1: We understand you do not accept the terms offered and no longer wish to proceed.
customerAcceptance.declined.line2: In case you would like to apply for a new loan, please visit us at https://jm.jmmb.com/.
customerAcceptance.declined.line3: Please feel free to contact Customer Service @ 1-800-837-6584 with any questions.
customerAcceptance.accepted.line2: We have received your details and will get in touch with you shortly. Please check your email and for questions, contact 800.837.6584

accountNumber.label: Account Number
accountNumber.validation.mismatch: Account Number and Confirm Account Number should be same

confirmAccountNumber.label: Confirm Account Number
confirmAccountNumber.validation.mismatch: Account Number and Confirm Account Number should be same

meetingDate.validation.required: Please enter Select Time of Appointment
